pullrequest.title: Apply gamma correction when Scene3D engine is set to ogre2

content.raw:
The demo works well for me. Ign-gazebo is also crashing with:

~~~
[GUI] [Err] [RenderEngineManager.cc:127] No render-engine registered with name: ogre
[GUI] [Err] [Scene3D.cc:707] Engine [ogre] is not supported

Thread 36 "ignition::gui::" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffaa34e700 (LWP 21956)]
0x00007fffb001075a in ignition::gui::plugins::IgnRenderer::Render (
    this=this@entry=0x555556f2baa0)
    at /usr/include/c++/8/bits/shared_ptr_base.h:1002
1002          _M_get() const noexcept
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007fffb001075a in ignition::gui::plugins::IgnRenderer::Render (
    this=this@entry=0x555556f2baa0)
    at /usr/include/c++/8/bits/shared_ptr_base.h:1002
#1  0x00007fffb0010ecb in ignition::gui::plugins::RenderThread::RenderNext (
    this=0x555556f2ba80) at /home/developer/ign-gui/src/plugins/Scene3D.cc:823
#2  0x00007ffff5a7f122 in QObject::event(QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#3  0x00007ffff5a4f83a in QCoreApplication::notify(QObject*, QEvent*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#4  0x00007ffff5a4f9a8 in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal2(QObject*, QEvent*)
    () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#5  0x00007ffff5a5211d in QCoreApplicationPrivate::sendPostedEvents(QObject*, int, QThreadData*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#6  0x00007ffff5aa92c3 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#7  0x00007ffff08b0287 in g_main_context_dispatch ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#8  0x00007ffff08b04c0 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#9  0x00007ffff08b054c in g_main_context_iteration ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0
#10 0x00007ffff5aa88ef in QEventDispatcherGlib::processEvents(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#11 0x00007ffff5a4d9ea in QEventLoop::exec(QFlags<QEventLoop::ProcessEventsFlag>) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#12 0x00007ffff586c22a in QThread::exec() ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#13 0x00007ffff587116d in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#14 0x00007ffff3b926db in start_thread (arg=0x7fffaa34e700)
    at pthread_create.c:463
#15 0x00007ffff4f4f88f in clone ()
    at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:95
~~~
